Frame2

Packages
org.megatome.frame2 Provides classes used at all levels of the Frame2 framework
org.megatome.frame2.errors Provides error objects and collections of errors to be used by the framework.
org.megatome.frame2.errors.impl Provides factories for creating individual Error objects and Errors collections.
org.megatome.frame2.event Provides interfaces for Events and Event Handlers.
org.megatome.frame2.event.xml Provides interfaces for events defined as passthru to use
org.megatome.frame2.front Provides classes that make up the Front Controller.
org.megatome.frame2.introspector Provides support for mapping request data into events through reflection
org.megatome.frame2.jaxb Provides base classes for web service related events
org.megatome.frame2.log Provides for logging within the Frame2 framework
org.megatome.frame2.plugin Provides an interface for developers to create plugins to the Frame2 framework.
org.megatome.frame2.validator Provides access to the Commons Validator functions
